title: Skelly and the Missing Leg
description: A skeleton named Skelly wakes up to find he's missing a leg and goes on an adventure to find it, meeting various characters along the way.

pages.title: Missing Leg Discovery
pages.description: Skelly wakes up and discovers he's missing a leg

sentences.Skelly the Skeleton woke up with a stret: Skelly the Skeleton woke up with a stretch and a rattle.
sentences.\"Morning bones!\" he yawned. But someth: "Morning bones!" he yawned. But something didn't feel quite right...
sentences.\"Oh no!\" Skelly gasped. \"I'm missing: "Oh no!" Skelly gasped. "I'm missing a leg!"

pages.title: Searching the House
pages.description: Skelly searches his house for the missing leg

sentences.Skelly hopped in circles, wobbling like: Skelly hopped in circles, wobbling like a spinning spoon.
sentences.\"I must've kicked it off in my sleep!\": "I must've kicked it off in my sleep!" he said.
He peeked under his coffin bed. Nope.
sentences.He checked behind the closet full of cob: He checked behind the closet full of cobwebs. Nada.

pages.title: Outside Search
pages.description: Skelly goes outside calling for his leg

sentences.He hopped out of his dusty old house, ca: He hopped out of his dusty old house, calling,
sentences.The wind howled back, but there was no a: The wind howled back, but there was no answer.

pages.title: Meeting Benny the Bat
pages.description: Skelly meets Benny the Bat who suggests asking Frankie the Frog

sentences.It was Benny the Bat, hanging upside dow: It was Benny the Bat, hanging upside down from a tree.
sentences.\"Skelly! You're looking... half as tall: "Skelly! You're looking... half as tall as usual!"
"Have you seen my leg?" asked Skelly.
sentences.Benny flapped. \"Nope! But maybe Frankie: Benny flapped. "Nope! But maybe Frankie the Frog saw something. He's always jumping around!"

pages.title: Frankie the Frog
pages.description: Skelly asks Frankie the Frog about the missing leg

sentences.At the swamp, Skelly found Frankie sitti: At the swamp, Skelly found Frankie sitting on a lily pad.
sentences.\"Frankie, have you seen a bony leg hop: "Frankie, have you seen a bony leg hop by?"
sentences.Frankie blinked. \"I saw something long: Frankie blinked. "I saw something long and white floating down the creek!"

pages.title: The Broomstick
pages.description: They find an old broomstick instead of the leg

sentences.They raced to the creekâ€”but it wasn't: They raced to the creekâ€”but it wasn't a leg.
sentences.Skelly sighed, but thanked him anyway. \: Skelly sighed, but thanked him anyway. "Onward!"

pages.title: The Graveyard
pages.description: Skelly asks the ghosts in the graveyard

sentences.Skelly wobbled into the graveyard, where: Skelly wobbled into the graveyard, where the ghosts liked to play tag.
sentences.\"Hey, Casper! Hey, Wisp!\" he called. \: "Hey, Casper! Hey, Wisp!" he called. "Seen a leg wandering around?"
sentences.One ghost giggled, \"Something kicked me: One ghost giggled, "Something kicked me in the head last night!"
sentences.\"In the old mausoleum. It made a 'clunk: "In the old mausoleum. It made a 'clunk' and flew off!"

pages.title: The Mausoleum
pages.description: Skelly searches the mausoleum and finds a mannequin leg

sentences.Inside the mausoleum, Skelly crept past: Inside the mausoleum, Skelly crept past creaky tombs and sleepy spiders.
sentences.But when he picked it upâ€”clunk!: But when he picked it upâ€”clunk!
sentences.It was a mannequin leg, left from last y: It was a mannequin leg, left from last year's costume party.
sentences.\"Not again,\" Skelly groaned, tossing i: "Not again," Skelly groaned, tossing it aside.

pages.title: Wanda the Witch
pages.description: Skelly visits Wanda the Witch who found his leg

Next stop: the haunted pumpkin patch.
sentences.Wanda the Witch was there, practicing sp: Wanda the Witch was there, practicing spells.
"Have you seen my leg?" Skelly asked.
sentences.Wanda cackled. \"Was that what my cat dr: Wanda cackled. "Was that what my cat dragged in this morning?"

pages.title: Found the Leg
pages.description: Skelly finds his real leg in Wanda's cauldron

sentences.Sure enough, in Wanda's cauldron sat a b: Sure enough, in Wanda's cauldron sat a bony leg...
sentences.with a sock still on it!: with a sock still on it!
sentences.The black cat hissed and backed away wit: The black cat hissed and backed away with a "Mrrrow!"

pages.title: Leg Reattached
pages.description: Skelly reattaches his leg and secures it

sentences.\"Careful, it's a little boiled,\" Wanda: "Careful, it's a little boiled," Wanda warned.
sentences.Skelly picked it up and clicked it back: Skelly picked it up and clicked it back in place with a satisfying SNAP!
sentences.\"Aaaah, much better,\" he said, doing a: "Aaaah, much better," he said, doing a happy little jig.

pages.title: Secure for the Night
pages.description: Skelly ties his leg to prevent it from running away again

sentences.That night, back in bed, Skelly tied his: That night, back in bed, Skelly tied his leg to his hip with a shoelace.
He closed his eye sockets and smiled.
sentences.Somewhere, Benny the Bat giggled from th: Somewhere, Benny the Bat giggled from the rafters.

pages.title: The End
pages.description: The story ends with a playful warning

sentences....Or is it? Better check your toes befo: ...Or is it? Better check your toes before you sleep! ðŸ‘£
